column3: “Delicious tasting flower.”
“Well my friend and I smoked barely anything (I smoke everyday,he doesn't). He proceeded to fall off the bed three times and trip for 6 hour”

“Taste is sweet and smooth
Smell is fruity and earthy 
Looks are dense nugs with lots of hairs 
Price $40/8th”

“Tastes sweet and fruity as green vapor moving to nutty brown hits, responds well to decarb'ing, and makes excellent canna-butter. 
Effect is relaxing and calming to GI spasticity, providing good relief for chronic nausea and vomiting caused by celiac and autoimmune disease.”

“Very tasty, I  like the Blackberry taste. 
Wonderful buzz, I got a lot done.”

“Blackberry Rhino is quite a good strain to choose for pain relief.  It's a nice, potent Indica whose effects are euphoric and surreal, and easily taps into the imagination.   The high is heavily oriented in the body, causing a comforting, warm sort of relief.  Its flavor is very sweet, with a slightly sour, fruity taste, with a smell a bit reminiscent to strains like Fruity Pebbles.”
“wow, cough cough, this is one of the tastiest indicas I have smoked yet.  in fact this strain is so unique with its terpenes you can identify its smell, even if the guy up the block is smoking it.”
“nice body high”

“Delicious berry flavor, frosty green and purple nugs, and one of the smoothest smokes I've ever had! No coughing, just pure enjoyment. This stuff kicks in quick and is quite uplifting for an Indica! Definitely worth a try!!b”
“nice body high”
“wow, cough cough, this is one of the tastiest indicas I have smoked yet.  in fact this strain is so unique with its terpenes you can identify its smell, even if the guy up the block is smoking it.”

“I really enjoyed this strain. I suffer from chronic pain associated with MS and Insomnia and this took care of both!!! I would definitely recommend this strain to anyone who is looking for something to knock out your pain.”

“Lovely, relaxing strain. Perfect for getting home from work late because all the soreness just evaporates and it clears your head. Not a favorite, but definitely up there. Helps with my chronic nausea/vomiting, too.”
“high lasts longer, great for catching up with your rest or calming down after a long days of work.”

“I thought it would be better. it was good. however taste and short effect we're an issue. It was a premium priced strain and I expected allot. Buzz was fairly intent but short lived. Taste was harsher with less Berry and more rhino...good sleep aid.”
“I thought it would put me to sleep but instead it gave me tons of energy. I was acting pretty wacky, honestly.”
“From Herbal Connect in TriCities Washington. Super crystals and white. Smell is unique but fruity. Awesome high. Relaxed on the couch but giggly 😝😉”
“I smoked a outdoor version of this flower and it was REALLY GOOD not as good as the indoor but it was still good.”
“Very good and surprising...it's an indica or sativa ? ...anyways it's amazing. I think bmwo sent me the demonstrator so it is identical to the one on the site.”
“Great after a long day at work and before a good movie. Definitely gives me a sleepy after high feeling. Nice taste as well”
“Anyone know where I can get some clones of this lovely flower?”
“Very pleasing on the eye. Very good aroma , very potent punch .Helps me sleep for my insomnia medical issue.”
“pleasant taste and a worth repeating buzz”
“This strain packs an indica punch like no other I'm stoked to see more of this strain in the tricities hopefully below $200 but with the indica I'd pay up to $250 to get my hands on it”
